The True Witness declares that when you suppose you are really in a good condition of prosperity, you are in need of everything. . . . Because Christ 
88
bears this rebuking testimony, shall we suppose that he is destitute of tender love to his people?—O, no! He who died to redeem man from death, loves with a divine love, and those whom he loves he rebukes. “As many as I love, I rebuke and chasten.” [Revelation 3:19.] — Vol. 3, p. 257.
